DATASET_COLORSTRIP

COLOR	#ff0000

LEGEND_SHAPES	2	2	2	2	2	2	2	2	2

LEGEND_LABELS	Shigella	EIEC	ExPEC	STEC	ETEC	EPEC	APEC	EAEC	AIEC

STRIP_WIDTH 25
